text: Martina Fidanza (born 5 November 1999) is an Italian professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI Women's Continental Team . She is the daughter and sister of racing cyclists Giovanni Fidanza and Arianna Fidanza. ==Major results== ;2016 :1st 20px Team Sprint, National Junior Track Championships :2nd Team sprint, UCI World Junior Track Championships :3rd Keirin, Jihomoravsky Kraj ;2017 :UCI World Junior Track Championships ::1st 20px Scratch Race ::1st 20px Team Pursuit :UEC European Junior Track Championships ::1st 20px Team Pursuit ::1st 20px Scratch Race ::2nd Keirin :2nd Scratch Race, National Junior Track Championships :2nd Road Race, National Junior Road Championships :3rd Piccolo Trofeo Alfredo Binda (Trofeo Da Moreno) ;2018 :1st 20px Keirin, National Track Championships :2nd Team Pursuit, European U23 Track Championships :9th Trofee Maarten Wynants ;2019 :National Track Championships ::1st 20px Keirin ::3rd Individual Sprint :1st Scratch Race, UCI Track World Cup – Hong Kong :2nd Scratch Race, European Games :2nd Scratch Race, UCI Track World Cup – Minsk ;2020 :European U23 Track Championships ::1st 20px Team Pursuit ::1st 20px Scratch Race ::1st 20px Madison ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1999 births Category:Living people Category:Italian female cyclists Category:People from the Province of Bergamo Category:Cyclists at the 2019 European Games Category:European Games competitors for Italy Category:European Games medalists in cycling Category:European Games silver medalists for Italy
title: Martina Fidanza
